column4: Has anyone had a problem with recent updates in breezy eating their ipw2200 and breaking xfree? (It seems to be causing a udev problem)
The breezy upgrade broke my X because of new font locations. A "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" will fix this.
My problem is it ate the device files for X.
I don't quite follow what you mean by eaten device files?  You've lost entries in /dev? Or lost the drivers in /usr?
